data.name: Wildhammer
data.description:
Wildhammer Dwarf

Units:
+10% attack rate
-4 armor

Buildings:
+100 attack range
-10% attack rate

Upgrades:
-5% cost

Traits: Wild warriors with primitive weaponry, highly focused on battle rage. Very limited use of magic. Imbues units with power runes instead. Vulnerable to dispels. Has superior air forces.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Recon Aura
auras.description:
Reveals entire map
Reveals invisible units
(10000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+10% unit damage
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+8 unit armor
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Ambush Tactics [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Runic Tattoos

Reduces spell damage to Slayer, Axe Thrower, Rune Scribe and Bear Rider by 15%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

Battle Cry
Runic Tattoos

Type: Early Push

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power
If you like your Heroes, this makes them even better. Some races depend on them more than others, though.

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [V]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [S]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [D]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Dark Granite [C]
bonuses.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Dark Granite
spells.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

spells.name: Emergency Repair (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Restores 100 HP over 30 sec.
(can affect mechanical units)
(can target your enemy as well)
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

spells.description:

towerUpgrades.name: Berserk
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate after a kill
Affects: Slayer and Axe Thrower

Lv1: +60% attack rate for 15 sec
Lv2: +80% attack rate for 15 sec
Lv3: +100% attack rate for 15 sec
Lv4: +120% attack rate for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Cyclone
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: disabling ability
Affects: Rune Scribe
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: lasts 2 sec
Lv2: lasts 4 sec
Lv3: lasts 6 sec
Lv4: lasts 8 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Cry
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage in 400 AoE
Affects: Slayer
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +12% damage for 15 sec
Lv2: +24% damage for 15 sec
Lv3: +36% damage for 15 sec
Lv4: +48% damage for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Rallying Cry
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus armor in 500 AoE
Affects: Axe Thrower
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +3 armor for 15 sec
Lv2: +5 armor for 15 sec
Lv3: +7 armor for 15 sec
Lv4: +9 armor for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Storm Hammers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: range and damage in 175 AoE
Affects: Gryphon Rider
(slows units for 1 sec)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +25 range, 20% to do 60 damage
Lv2: +50 range, 25% to do 70 damage
Lv3: +75 range, 30% to do 80 damage
Lv4: +100 range, 35% to do 90 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Endurance Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: speed to nearby units
Affects: Bear Rider

Lv1: +5% attack, +3% move, 450 AoE
Lv2: +10% attack, +6% move, 500 AoE
Lv3: +15% attack, +9% move, 550 AoE
Lv4: +20% attack, +12% move, 600 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Animal Synergy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and evasion
Affects: Bear Rider, Feral Gryphon and Gryphon Rider

Lv1: +5% attack rate, +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% attack rate, +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% attack rate, +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% attack rate, +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Gryphon Taming
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every wave
Affects: All Barracks

Lv1: has Critical Strike (extra damage)
40%/50%/60%/70% to do 3x damage
(affects Air units only)
Lv2: has Swooping Attack (area damage)
45%/60%/75% damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: has Frenzy (damage after a kill)
+50%/+75% damage for 30 sec
Lv4: has Demolisher (extra damage)
2x damage to buildings

towerUpgrades.name: Runic Tattoos
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: regeneration and move speed
Affects: All organic non-Hero units

Lv1: +3 HP/sec, +4% move speed
Lv2: +6 HP/sec, +8% move speed
Lv3: +9 HP/sec, +12% move speed
Lv4: +12 HP/sec, +16% move speed

t1spell.name: Lightning Strike [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 350 damage in 170 AoE.
Stuns for 4 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Hurricane [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends cyclones in all directions.
Each wave deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: High Thane
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4 sec stun
(250-400 area of effect)

Windfury (Self Spell)
140-200% AS bonus after a kill
(has 3 sec duration)

Lightning Strike (Passive Skill)
20-25% for 90 damage, 2 sec stun

Runic Tattoos (Passive Skill)
6-12 HP/sec, 10-20% move speed

heroes.name: Thunder Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Thunder Wave (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4 sec stun

200-500 damage, 3-6 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Lightning Strike (Passive Skill)
20-25% for 90 damage, 2 sec stun

Avatar of Thunder (Self Spell)

heroes.name: Grand Shaman
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Hurricane (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(900-1200 wave distance)

Healing Wave (Healing Spell)
200-500 HP to 3 units

Arcane Aura (Support Aura)
1-7 HP/s regeneration bonus
(affects organic units only)

Tranquility (Healing Spell)
60-90 HP/s in an area for 10 sec

heroes.name: Ancient Air Elemental
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Forceful Wind (Damage Spell)
200-350 damage, 20-32% slow
(450-600 area of effect)

12-30% to evade an attack

Split (Self Spell)
splits into 3 units for 18-30 sec
